text: addeham parannu: enre janannale, ninnal cinticc neakkiyittuntea? nan enre raksitavinkal ninnulla vyaktamaya telivine avalambikkunnavanayirikkukayum avanre atukkal ninnulla karunyam avan enikk tannirikkukayum, ennitt ninnalkk (at kantariyanavatta vidham) andhata varuttappetukayuman untayittullatenkil (nan ent ceyyum?) ninnal at istappetattavarayirikke ninnalute mel nam atin nirbandham celuttukayea
